entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0059 incorrectly triggers when assigning to the indexer of a value type #77258
  • MSBuildWorkspace analyzer results are different in .NET 9.0.200 SDK compared to 9.0.103 and manual compilation #77255
  • Inconsistent behavior of attribute target specifiers on events #77254
  • Allow to change the behavior for interfaces for rule IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required #77253

Closed

  • Virtual static interface methods analyzis API #77257
  • PlatformCompatibilityAnalyzer should report a warning for `UnsupportedOSPlatform` attribute in interface implementation #77256
  • Make `InterceptableLocation` implement `IEquatable<InterceptableLocation>` #77135

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing word the documentation file #77259
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: doc comments #77200
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make `InterceptableLocation` implement `IEquatable<InterceptableLocation>` #77137
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next

Updated

  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Emit extension implementation methods #77197
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
